ygData.subject: Re: Rainbow Festival
ygData.msgSnippet: My times relative to East Coast (USA), Mornings doable but sleeepy (not a morning person, though life seems to insist I have to be awake then). Early-mid
ygData.messageBody:
My times relative to East Coast (USA),

Mornings doable but sleeepy (not a morning person, though life seems to
insist I have to be awake then).
Early-mid afternoon not good (its our usual run errands/get food for the
week time)
Late afternoon and later all good.


General Brell Notes:
BTW David, I noticed your hunting in LavaStorm now ... :) Let me know if
you ever want a tank, wiz or an enchanter for companay, I have one of each
at just under your level in FP or Neriak. (Taizu/Shiri/Deceit). Shiri
(Wiz) is tagged in Mystical Alliance as well :) And if you want to try and
see if my 8th DE Necro Shade (too low to hunt with you) can mule gossimer
robe/armor for you let me know. She has the proper faction to get them :).

Poem to follow ..

- Lora
